description:
Conan, Ran, and Kogoro come to a traditional-style house cafe located in a mountain village. The cafe is currently holding its Okuho Mountain Village Festival, but only cafe managers and husband and wife Takehara Genichi and Takehara Satoko, falconer Akashiba Tetsu, and farmer Ishima Masahiko are present at the cafe. While enjoying the falconry and puffed rice making demonstrations, Conan and his friends spot Genichi, who had gone boar hunting, with a gunshot wound in his chest, and he dies right before their eyes...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nou Aru Taka wa Tsumi o Kakusu
The Skilled Hawk Hides His Crimes
